servicesChild.title: Branding & Logo Design
servicesChild.subtitle: Make your brand unique and memorable.
servicesChild.description: I help create brand identities by designing unique logos and visual styles that give your business a professional look.

servicesChild.title: Social Media Design
servicesChild.subtitle: Get more attention on social media.
servicesChild.description: I create eye-catching posts and banners for Instagram, Facebook, and other platforms. Your content will be visually appealing and aligned with your brand identity.

servicesChild.title: Web Design (UI/UX)
servicesChild.subtitle: Make your website attractive and user-friendly.
servicesChild.description: I design modern and intuitive websites that users love. My approach is based on UX/UI principles to ensure a seamless and efficient user experience.

description.title: About Me
description.desc: I am a passionate and creative graphic designer with a keen eye for detail and a strong sense of visual storytelling. With experience in branding, illustration, and UI/UX design, I create visually compelling designs that effectively communicate ideas and enhance user experiences. My expertise includes logo design, typography, and color theory, ensuring that each project is both aesthetically appealing and strategically impactful. Always eager to explore new trends and technologies, I strive to deliver innovative and meaningful designs that leave a lasting impression.

contact.title: Let's Create Togethere
contact.subtitle: I'm a graphic designer and illustrator based in London. I'm available for freelance work, collaborations
